DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year Active CD ( CDAI > 220 ) sign active inflammation evidence elevated serum hsCRP level ( > 5 mg/L ) and/or elevate fecal calprotectin level ( > 250 µg/g ) endoscopically visible ulcer . Patients must naïve biologics indication start antiTNF therapy accordance national reimbursement criterion . Patients must naïve thiopurines fail therapy thiopurines ( case AZA continue ) . Ongoing steroid allow stable dose least 2 week maximum prednisone 40 mg/d budesonide 9 mg/day . Patients consent receive Infliximab 5 mg/kg week 0 , 2 6 every 8 week conjunction azathioprine ( 2,5 mg/kg/day ) . Patients develop AZA intolerance trial continue trial without AZA ( ie IFX monotherapy ) .
